channel.title: Ban option?
channel.description: Yeah, my client has a ban option, where there's the attack button, trade button, follow, etc. And we've found that it's annoying if you attack someone, but accidentally ban them. How can I get rid of this?

item.title: Ban option?
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

Yeah, my client has a ban option, where there’s the attack button, trade button, follow, etc. And we’ve found that it’s annoying if you attack someone, but accidentally ban them. How can I get rid of this?
